title: My first project
subtitle: Copy a web page
pars: This is the first proyect that I made. The proposal was to imitate a webpage using HTML, CSS and Javascript as those where the tecnologies that we were learning at the moment
As it was a easy proyect, although it was my first one, I decided to have fun whit it, so there are some nonsenses on the 'news' section and some other eastereggs on the page.
This one was an exelent proyect to start learning and practicing the basics of web development. Also, aferwards, I realized how frameworks like React can make the development process much easier.
